thread.title: China commerce ministry urges U.S. to abandon unilateralism, use dialogue

title: China commerce ministry urges U.S. to abandon unilateralism, use dialogue
text:
April 26, 2018 / 2:34 AM / Updated 34 minutes ago China commerce ministry urges U.S. to abandon unilateralism, use dialogue Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
BEIJING (Reuters) - China’s commerce ministry the United States should abandon trade unilateralism and adopt a consultative approach via dialogue. Containers are seen at the Yangshan Deep Water Port in Shanghai, China April 24, 2018. REUTERS/Aly Song
If the “wrong actions” taken by the U.S. were left unchecked, the authority of the world’s multilateral trade system will be harmed, commerce ministry spokesman Gao Feng told reporters at a regular briefing in Beijing.
Gao reiterated that China opposes all forms of unilateralism and protectionism. Reporting by Stella Qiu and Ryan Woo; Editing by Kim Coghill
